name: A Night With Gunkle
description:
Its a normal night.  You and your date "Gunkle" are relaxing, or at least Gunkle is.  But all of a sudden you spot a figure stalking you from the darkness.  Who are they?  What do they want?  Survive the night and found out

ALSO THIS GAME IS IMPOSSIBLE

COMMENT IF YOU WIN BECAUSE I DONT THINK YOU CAN
